Activity: Log in, check emails. Review the progress from yesterday. Begin working on the data collection workflow training module.

Research the new data collection workflow, including data entry, validation, and reporting steps (defined in Subtask 2). Review process documentation, diagrams, and flowcharts. Reach out to @clinlead-1 and @itpm-1 via email to request a walk-through of the new workflow. @CLINLEAD-1 @ITPM-1 Topic: Data Collection Workflow Walkthrough Request.

Outline the data collection workflow training module. Focus on a step-by-step explanation of the process, highlighting key responsibilities and potential challenges. Consider incorporating interactive elements or simulations.

Collaborate with @ehrv-1 to gain a deeper understanding of the technical aspects of the EHR system and data collection process. Schedule a brief meeting to discuss specific questions and concerns. @EHRV-1 Topic: Technical aspects of EHR data collection workflow
Create visual aids for the data collection workflow module. Design flowcharts, diagrams, and screenshots to illustrate the process. Use color-coding and clear labeling to enhance understanding.

Draft a script for a short video demonstrating the data collection workflow. Include a narrator explaining each step and a visual demonstration of the process within the EHR system. If necessary, coordinate with @helpdesk-1 for access to a test EHR environment. @HELPDESK-1 Topic: Access to test EHR environment for training video.

Review the progress on both training modules and identify any gaps or areas that need further development. Prepare a list of questions for @clinlead-1 related to the clinical relevance of the data collection workflow. @CLINLEAD-1 Topic: Clinical relevance of data collection workflow
